basics.name: Anh Minh Nguyen
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2028.

education.institution: University of Hawai'i at Mānoa, Honolulu, HI

work.summary: Provides administrative and clerical support to faculty.
highlights: Resonsible for inputting and updating information about courses, maintaining database, and organized files relating to Gen Ed courses and requirements.
Answering phone calls, responding to emails, and assisting students and faculty with questions and inquiries.

volunteer.summary: Provide students with help on Math and English subject while assiting other tutor connect with teachers whose students need academic support
highlights: Tutored students in elementary through high school. Mainly focused on helping out students who are easily distracted with homework and international students with English and Mathematics
Helped members connect with teachers with students who need tutoring.

volunteer.organization: Sacred Hearts Academy's Summer School Program
volunteer.summary: Helped as a teacher assistant for STEM classes during summer school to teach 4th-6th graders about robotics and science.
Organized volunteer and networking events for members.
highlights: Help coming up and organizing volunteer events for students to help inspire and educate young women, including the Hawaii Food Bank and MADD walk (Mothers Against Drunk Driving).
Organized events, such as 'Career Cafe', where students can talk to the school’s alumni about the career path they are interested in.

awards.title: Mānoa International Excellence Scholar
awards.summary: Scholarsips for incoming international students base on their academic records and community engagement.
